title: BRIGHT 1-BR APT MAIN & CUSTER NEAR SHOPS, RAIL & BUS
posting_body: BRIGHT 1-BEDROOM APARTMENT at Main & Custer in vintage building with modern appliances and hardwood floors.
Tenant pays for cooking gas, electricity, cable and internet.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IS AT YOUR DOOR: CTA Buses and Purple Line train, METRA commuter rail, NORTHWESTERN U. shuttle at Chicago and Main
Private lot behind the building or on neighborhood streets.
CONVENIENT LOCATION: restaurants, boutiques, laundromat/cleaners and food markets are down the block and around the corner.
Only a ten-minute walk to beach and parks, Lakefront Historic District , bike/jogging paths.
Convenient to Northwestern and Loyola Universities.
Only 20 minutes by METRA train to downtown Chicago or the north shore suburbs.
For more information or to set appointment: phone or text Carla at 847/736-2824  Please leave name, contact info and desired date of occupancy.
